document_data.name: ''The Fight of Green Thirteen''
document_data.author: [[Gallow Deely]]
document_data.Contents: The song, originally performed on the [[enchanted]] ''[[Cittern of War]]'', told of the heroic struggle of the [[Company of Frozen Trees]], aided by Gallow Deely's own magical music, against a young [[green dragon]] in the {{YearlinkName|1013}}. The song continued being a mainstay of [[West Faerûn]]ean savers into the 14{{th}} century DR.
